description.value:
Your descriptors and details are vague and leave much to the imagination. You might use terse imagery to describe something, or your painted shapes are vague enough to interpret something out of it. Beauty and meaning are in the eyes of beholder, and this is reflected in your work. When you envision your spells, they deliver their message while the observer is left pondering it even after it overtakes them.

Favored Tradition Occult

Additional Spells 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image} 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.87zLUuTMmZ9zc7gH]{Oneiric Mire} 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage}5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{Shadow Siphon} 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0XP2XOxT9VSiXFDr]{Phantasmal Calamity} 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Planar Palace} 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YiIOsc8T6E2iDxgh]{Undermine Reality} 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MJx7DmjsWYzDZ3a4]{Phantasmagoria}10th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6s0UW4bujggma9TC]{Fabricated Truth}

Visionary Spell You learn the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.X3SHuud5tqrgznjP]{Stippling Shades} foundation visionary spell.
